description: Convert a p-value to a statistic of choice with reference to a specific dataset.

dataset.title: Dataset
dataset.description: Specify a dataset DDD and, if it has multiple sub-bricks, the [i]th subbrick with the statistic of interest MUST be selected explicitly; note the use of quotation marks around the brick selector (because of the square-brackets). 'i' can be either a number or a string label selector.

pvalue.title: P-Value
pvalue.description: Input p-value P, which MUST be in the interval [0,1].

quiet.title: Quiet
quiet.description: Output only the final statistic value.
